overview: Unfinished movie. Remnants of a failed project. Fragments of a reanimated film-corpse. Recording of a  city and a search. Street Music. A man obsessed with a woman and the decibels of the city. Saturn as a hotel and also as the planet of melancholy and self-control. Visual artist Sasha Laskowsky stars in this severed story. A silent movie about sound.
title: Saturn
